page.title: 12SOUTHLANDS SCHOOL
page.content: Schools <Private> Special. Southlands School started in 1968, now run by the Hesley Group of Schools is a D>E>S> listed independant special school which caters for 72 boys aged 13-16 years with behavorial,social or emotional problems.There are 8 classes with numerous psychological,medical and educational experts on call as well as the regular teachers and domestic staff.The fees are paid by those Local Authorities which send the boys to the school.Education varies from necessary remedial levels to normal CSE courses according to ability. There is a lot of outdoor activity.The school has its own heated swimming pool,floodlit,hard surfaced playground,football and other pitches in its 10 acres of grounds.The main building is Georgian, extended and modernised for accomodation.
